1.16.4.0.3.2: Removed TerraForged Dependency. Added food items for many species! Bumped Abnormals Core version to 3.1.1. Merged custom models into mod!

1.15.2.0.2.4: Branches no longer connect to leaves! Branches and twigs now only connect to ground blocks downwards!
1.15.2.0.2.2: Twigs are no longer climbable! This was making walking through a dense forest a little annoying. Fixes and improvements!
1.15.2.0.2.1: Added stripped branches and twigs! Fixed blockstate updating for branches and twigs with waterlogging! Twigs are now climbable! World loading screen colors are now done in Isabella style!
1.15.2.0.2.0: Now a total of 57 trees added, bring the total to 63 including vanilla trees! Fixed Swamp and Dark Forest tinting for Isabella style. Fixed vanilla leaves item tints for Isabella style.
1.15.2.0.1.0: Initial release with a few trees and branches and twigs.
